mapper.select: SELECT t.crop_variety_insurability_guid, t.is_quantity_insurable_ind, t.is_unseeded_insurable_ind, t.is_plant_insurable_ind, t.is_awp_eligible_ind, t.is_underseeding_eligible_ind, t.is_grain_unseeded_default_ind, t.create_user, t.create_date, t.update_user, t.update_date , v.crop_variety_id, v.variety_name, c.plant_duration_type_code FROM crop_variety v JOIN crop_commodity c ON c.crop_commodity_id = v.crop_commodity_id LEFT JOIN crop_variety_insurability t ON t.crop_variety_id = v.crop_variety_id WHERE c.insurance_plan_id = #{insurancePlanId} ORDER BY t.crop_variety_id

WITH isf AS ( select t.crop_variety_id, t.is_quantity_insurable_ind, t.plant_insurability_type_code, t.is_awp_eligible_ind, u.is_unseeded_insurable_ind from inventory_seeded_forage t join inventory_field f on f.inventory_field_guid = t.inventory_field_guid left join inventory_unseeded u on u.inventory_field_guid = f.inventory_field_guid ) , inv AS ( select distinct underseeded_crop_variety_id from inventory_field where underseeded_crop_variety_id is not null ) select v.crop_variety_id, CASE WHEN quantity.crop_variety_id = v.crop_variety_id THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS is_quantity_insurable_editable_ind, CASE WHEN plant.crop_variety_id = v.crop_variety_id THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS is_plant_insurable_editable_ind, CASE WHEN awp.crop_variety_id = v.crop_variety_id THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS is_awp_eligible_editable_ind, CASE WHEN unseeded.crop_variety_id = v.crop_variety_id THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS is_unseeded_insurable_editable_ind, CASE WHEN inv.underseeded_crop_variety_id = v.crop_variety_id THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS is_underseeding_eligible_editable_ind from crop_variety v join crop_commodity c on c.crop_commodity_id = v.crop_commodity_id left join crop_variety_insurability cvi on cvi.crop_variety_id = v.crop_variety_id left join ( select distinct isf.crop_variety_id from isf where isf.is_quantity_insurable_ind = 'Y' ) as quantity on quantity.crop_variety_id = v.crop_variety_id left join ( select distinct isf.crop_variety_id from isf where isf.plant_insurability_type_code is not null ) as plant on plant.crop_variety_id = v.crop_variety_id left join ( select distinct isf.crop_variety_id from isf where isf.is_awp_eligible_ind = 'Y' ) as awp on awp.crop_variety_id = v.crop_variety_id left join ( select distinct isf.crop_variety_id from isf where isf.is_unseeded_insurable_ind = 'Y' ) as unseeded on unseeded.crop_variety_id = v.crop_variety_id left join inv on inv.underseeded_crop_variety_id = v.crop_variety_id where c.insurance_plan_id = #{insurancePlanId}
